5#ifndef V8_CODEGEN_MACRO_ASSEMBLER_H_
6#define V8_CODEGEN_MACRO_ASSEMBLER_H_
7
8#include "src/codegen/macro-assembler-base.h"
9#include "src/execution/frames.h"
10#include "src/heap/heap.h"
11
12// Helper types to make boolean flag easier to read at call-site.
13enum class InvokeType { kCall, kJump };
14
15// Flags used for the AllocateInNewSpace functions.
16enum AllocationFlags {
17 // No special flags.
18 NO_ALLOCATION_FLAGS = 0,
19 // The content of the result register already contains the allocation top in
20 // new space.
21 RESULT_CONTAINS_TOP = 1 << 0,
22 // Specify that the requested size of the space to allocate is specified in
23 // words instead of bytes.
24 SIZE_IN_WORDS = 1 << 1,
25 // Align the allocation to a multiple of kDoubleSize
26 DOUBLE_ALIGNMENT = 1 << 2,
27 // Directly allocate in old space
28 PRETENURE = 1 << 3,
29};
30
31enum class JumpMode {
32 kJump, // Does a direct jump to the given address
33 kPushAndReturn // Pushes the given address as the current return address and
34 // does a return
35};
36
37enum class SmiCheck { kOmit, kInline };
38
39enum class ComparisonMode {
40 // The default compare mode will use a 32-bit comparison when pointer
41 // compression is enabled and the root is a tagged value.
42 kDefault,
43 // This mode can be used when the value to compare may not be located inside
44 // the main pointer compression cage.
45 kFullPointer,
46};
47
48enum class SetIsolateDataSlots {
49 kNo,
50 kYes,
51};
52
53// This is the only place allowed to include the platform-specific headers.
54#define INCLUDED_FROM_MACRO_ASSEMBLER_H
55#if V8_TARGET_ARCH_IA32
56#include "src/codegen/ia32/macro-assembler-ia32.h"
57#elif V8_TARGET_ARCH_X64
58#include "src/codegen/x64/macro-assembler-x64.h"
59#elif V8_TARGET_ARCH_ARM64
60#include "src/codegen/arm64/constants-arm64.h"
61#include "src/codegen/arm64/macro-assembler-arm64.h"
62#elif V8_TARGET_ARCH_ARM
63#include "src/codegen/arm/constants-arm.h"
64#include "src/codegen/arm/macro-assembler-arm.h"
65#elif V8_TARGET_ARCH_PPC || V8_TARGET_ARCH_PPC64
66#include "src/codegen/ppc/constants-ppc.h"
67#include "src/codegen/ppc/macro-assembler-ppc.h"
68#elif V8_TARGET_ARCH_MIPS64
69#include "src/codegen/mips64/constants-mips64.h"
70#include "src/codegen/mips64/macro-assembler-mips64.h"
71#elif V8_TARGET_ARCH_LOONG64
72#include "src/codegen/loong64/constants-loong64.h"
73#include "src/codegen/loong64/macro-assembler-loong64.h"
74#elif V8_TARGET_ARCH_S390
75#include "src/codegen/s390/constants-s390.h"
76#include "src/codegen/s390/macro-assembler-s390.h"
77#elif V8_TARGET_ARCH_RISCV32 || V8_TARGET_ARCH_RISCV64
78#include "src/codegen/riscv/constants-riscv.h"
79#include "src/codegen/riscv/macro-assembler-riscv.h"
80#else
81#error Unsupported target architecture.
82#endif
83#undef INCLUDED_FROM_MACRO_ASSEMBLER_H

85namespace v8 {
86namespace internal {
87
88// Maximum number of parameters supported in calls to C/C++. The C++ standard
89// defines a limit of 256 parameters but in simulator builds we provide only
90// limited support.
91#ifdef USE_SIMULATOR
92static constexpr int kMaxCParameters = 20;
93#else
94static constexpr int kMaxCParameters = 256;
95#endif
96
97class V8_NODISCARD FrameScope {
98 public:
99 explicit FrameScope(MacroAssembler* masm, StackFrame::Type type,
100 SourceLocation loc = SourceLocation())
101 :
102#ifdef V8_CODE_COMMENTS
103 comment_(masm, frame_name(type), loc),
104#endif
105 masm_(masm),
106 type_(type),
107 old_has_frame_(masm->has_frame()) {
108 masm->set_has_frame(true);
109 if (type != StackFrame::MANUAL && type_ != StackFrame::NO_FRAME_TYPE) {
110 masm->EnterFrame(type);
111 }
112 }
113
114 ~FrameScope() {
115 if (type_ != StackFrame::MANUAL && type_ != StackFrame::NO_FRAME_TYPE) {
116 masm_->LeaveFrame(type_);
117 }
118 masm_->set_has_frame(old_has_frame_);
119 }
120
121 private:
122#ifdef V8_CODE_COMMENTS
123 const char* frame_name(StackFrame::Type type) {
124 switch (type) {
125 case StackFrame::NO_FRAME_TYPE:
126 return "Frame: NO_FRAME_TYPE";
127 case StackFrame::MANUAL:
128 return "Frame: MANUAL";
129#define FRAME_TYPE_CASE(type, field) \
130 case StackFrame::type: \
131 return "Frame: " #type;
132 STACK_FRAME_TYPE_LIST(FRAME_TYPE_CASE)
133#undef FRAME_TYPE_CASE
134 case StackFrame::NUMBER_OF_TYPES:
135 break;
136 }
137 return "Frame";
138 }
139
140 Assembler::CodeComment comment_;
141#endif // V8_CODE_COMMENTS
142
143 MacroAssembler* masm_;
144 StackFrame::Type const type_;
145 bool const old_has_frame_;
146};
147
148class V8_NODISCARD FrameAndConstantPoolScope {
149 public:
150 FrameAndConstantPoolScope(MacroAssembler* masm, StackFrame::Type type)
151 : masm_(masm),
152 type_(type),
153 old_has_frame_(masm->has_frame()),
154 old_constant_pool_available_(V8_EMBEDDED_CONSTANT_POOL_BOOL &&
155 masm->is_constant_pool_available()) {
156 masm->set_has_frame(true);
157 if (V8_EMBEDDED_CONSTANT_POOL_BOOL) {
158 masm->set_constant_pool_available(true);
159 }
160 if (type_ != StackFrame::MANUAL && type_ != StackFrame::NO_FRAME_TYPE) {
161 masm->EnterFrame(type, !old_constant_pool_available_);
162 }
163 }
164
165 ~FrameAndConstantPoolScope() {
166 masm_->LeaveFrame(type_);
167 masm_->set_has_frame(old_has_frame_);
168 if (V8_EMBEDDED_CONSTANT_POOL_BOOL) {
169 masm_->set_constant_pool_available(old_constant_pool_available_);
170 }
171 }
172
173 private:
174 MacroAssembler* masm_;
175 StackFrame::Type type_;
176 bool old_has_frame_;
177 bool old_constant_pool_available_;
178
179 DISALLOW_IMPLICIT_CONSTRUCTORS(FrameAndConstantPoolScope);
180};
181
182// Class for scoping the the unavailability of constant pool access.
183class V8_NODISCARD ConstantPoolUnavailableScope {
184 public:
185 explicit ConstantPoolUnavailableScope(Assembler* assembler)
186 : assembler_(assembler),
187 old_constant_pool_available_(V8_EMBEDDED_CONSTANT_POOL_BOOL &&
188 assembler->is_constant_pool_available()) {
189 if (V8_EMBEDDED_CONSTANT_POOL_BOOL) {
190 assembler->set_constant_pool_available(false);
191 }
192 }
193 ~ConstantPoolUnavailableScope() {
194 if (V8_EMBEDDED_CONSTANT_POOL_BOOL) {
195 assembler_->set_constant_pool_available(old_constant_pool_available_);
196 }
197 }
198
199 private:
200 Assembler* assembler_;
201 int old_constant_pool_available_;
202
203 DISALLOW_IMPLICIT_CONSTRUCTORS(ConstantPoolUnavailableScope);
204};
205
206class V8_NODISCARD AllowExternalCallThatCantCauseGC : public FrameScope {
207 public:
208 explicit AllowExternalCallThatCantCauseGC(MacroAssembler* masm)
209 : FrameScope(masm, StackFrame::NO_FRAME_TYPE) {}
210};
211
212// Prevent the use of the RootArray during the lifetime of this
213// scope object.
214class V8_NODISCARD NoRootArrayScope {
215 public:
216 explicit NoRootArrayScope(MacroAssembler* masm)
217 : masm_(masm), old_value_(masm->root_array_available()) {
218 masm->set_root_array_available(false);
219 }
220
221 ~NoRootArrayScope() { masm_->set_root_array_available(old_value_); }
222
223 private:
224 MacroAssembler* masm_;
225 bool old_value_;
226};
227
228} // namespace internal
229} // namespace v8
